meaningMnemonic: You accidentally stab your <radical>cross</radical> into the <radical>eye</radical> of a <radical>lion</radical>. This is a terrible thing you did and you need to <kanji>fix</kanji> it right now. I'll be <kanji>direct</kanji> with you, this is something you have to fix on your own.
readingMnemonic: As you try to <kanji>fix</kanji> the lion's eye, it starts to <reading>choke</reading> (ちょく) and make what can only be described as a <reading>jiki</reading>jiki sound (じき). Through its choking jikijiki sounds, it coughs up a gear. Wait. Is this a machine lion?
